contentrichtext.text: '''Robert Bell''' or '''Rob Bell''' may refer to: * [[Robert Bell (Speaker of the House of Commons)]] (died 1577), British politician * [[Robert Bell (17th century MP)]], Member of Parliament for [[Norfolk (UK Parliament constituency)|Norfolk]] * [[Robert Bell (writer)]] (1800–1867), Irish journalist & editor * [[Robert Bell (Lanark County politician)]] (1808–1894), Canadian legislator * [[Robert Bell (Ottawa politician)]] (1821–1873), Canadian legislator * [[Robert Bell (Toronto politician)]], Orangeman and legislator in Ontario, Canada * [[Robert Bell (geologist)]] (1841–1917), Canadian geologist * [[Robert Bell (Australian politician)]] (1950–2001), Australian politician * Robert Bell, musician and bassist with [[The Blue Nile]] * [[Robert Bell (writer and editor)]] (born 1953), author/editor of books, particularly on Irish Scots surnames * [[Robert Bell (KlickEx)|Robert A. J. Bell]], Financier, founder of KlickEx, son of Bob Bell, Yachtsman. * [[Robert Anning Bell]] (1863–1933), English artist and designer * [[Robert Charles Bell (engraver)]] 1806–1822, Scottish engraver * [[Robert Cook Bell]] (1880–1964), U.S. federal judge * [[Robert Duncan Bell]], acting governor of Bombay during the British Raj, 1937 * [[Robert E. Bell]] (1914–2006), archaeologist * [[Robert Edward Bell]] (1918–1992), Canadian nuclear physicist and principal of McGill University * [[Robert Holmes Bell]] (born 1944), U.S. federal judge * [[Robert J. T. Bell]] (1876–1963), Scottish mathematician * [[Robert James Bell]] (born 1975), known as Dr Rob, scientist, and host of Australian children's television programme Scope * [[Robert Bell (musician)]] (born 1950), American singer, songwriter, and bassist with Kool & the Gang * [[Robert M. Bell]] (born 1943), Chief Judge of the Maryland Court of Appeals * [[Robert William Bell]] (1875–1950), England international rugby player * [[Robert Bell (racing driver)]] (born 1979), British racing driver * [[Rob Bell (baseball)]] (Robert Allen Bell, born 1977), US Major League/Minor League baseball player * [[Rob Bell (Virginia politician)]] (born 1967), member of the Virginia House of Delegates * [[Rob Bell]] (Robert Holmes Bell Jr., born 1970), US author, Christian speaker and pastor * [[Bob Bell (motorsport)]] (Robert Charles Bell, born 1958), former team principal and technical director of the Renault Formula One team and current Mercedes GP technical director * [[Bob Bell (American football)]] (Robert Francis Bell, born 1948), former NFL defensive lineman * [[Bob Bell (actor)]] (Robert Lewis Bell, 1922–1997), actor noted for playing Bozo the Clown in Chicago * [[Robert Linfield Bell]] (born 1929), New Zealand politician * [[Bobby Bell (English footballer)]] (Robert Charles Bell, born 1950), English footballer * [[Bobby Bell (Scottish footballer)]] (Robert McDicken Bell, 1934–2007),association football player for various English and Scottish clubs * [[Robert Bell (footballer)]] (1911–1988), footballer who played for Tranmere Rovers and Everton * [[Chris Bell (politician)]] (Robert Christopher Bell, born 1959), U.S. Representative from Texas * [[Robert Charles Bell]] (1917–2002), author of several books on board games ==See also== * [[Bob Bell (disambiguation)]] {{hndis|Bell, Robert}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Bell, Robert}}
